main.name: FoodFort Project
main.description: FoodFort is a React-based food website that gives users options to order from, Foodfort is your trusted companion for exploring a world of flavours without leaving your home or office, whether you're wanting comfort food, looking for a healthy option, or trying out new flavours.
main.bio: I'm Samuel, a software developement engineer specializing in creating dynamic web applications. With expertise in both front-end and back-end development, I bring a comprehensive approach to building efficient solutions. On the front-end, I have a strong command of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and skilled in popular libraries and frameworks like React, Angular and Vue.Js. I enjoy crafting user interfaces that provide an exceptional user experience. On the back-end, I'm proficient in server-side languages such as Node.js and Python, and I have experience working with databases like MySQL and MongoDB. I'm also well-versed in RESTful APIs and know how to integrate third-party services effectively.
main.bio1: We're here to make every mealtime a memorable experience by committing to quality, convenience, and customer satisfaction. So, why delay? Join the Foodfort family right now.
main.contactmessage: Biko! You fit send me message here, Thank you.
